meanings.definition: A verbal or written remark expressing an opinion or reaction.
meanings.sent1: She always appreciates the comments on her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The teacher left comments on the students' essays.
meanings.sent3: The comments on the weather report made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His comments were like a spotlight on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The comments echoed in her mind long after the meeting.

meanings.definition: An explanation or interpretation of a text.
meanings.sent1: The comments at the bottom of the page clarified the poem.
meanings.sent2: I read the comments to understand the historical document better.
meanings.sent3: His comments on the recipe turned it into a comedy.
meanings.sent4: The comments were a key to unlocking the mystery of the story.
meanings.sent5: The comments painted a vivid picture of the author's intent.

meanings.definition: A note in explanation, criticism, or illustration of a passage in a book or other writing.
meanings.sent1: The comments in the margins helped me grasp the complex text.
meanings.sent2: She added comments to the article to provide more context.
meanings.sent3: The comments on the novel were like tiny treasure maps.
meanings.sent4: His comments were a flashlight guiding readers through the text.
meanings.sent5: The comments were like colorful bookmarks in the story.
